events.name: Terrorist Attack
events.description: terrorist attack
events.wd_description: offensive action

entities.name: terrorist group
entities.wd_description: group of people working together to commit acts of terrorism

entities.name: target location
entities.wd_description: point or an area on the Earth's surface or elsewhere

entities.name: cause for the terrorist group
entities.wd_description: entity which forms causality for an event

entities.name: person
entities.wd_description: being that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood

entities.name: terrorist
entities.wd_description: being that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood

entities.name: weapon
entities.wd_description: tool used to inflict damage or harm

entities.name: government
entities.wd_description: system or group of people governing an organized community, often a state

events.name: Radicalization
events.description: Radicalization of views
events.wd_description: social process by which people arrive at extreme views

events.name: Planning & Preparation
events.description: planning and preparation phase of the terrorist attack
events.wd_description: activity of achieving readiness for some event or activity

events.name: Execute Attack
events.description: terrorist attack chapter event
events.wd_description: action to injure another organism

events.name: Society Response
events.description: society responds to the terrorist attack
events.wd_description: action or statement in response to a stimulus or other event

events.name: Access Extremist Ideology
events.description: accessing extremist social networks, content, or lectures
events.wd_description: earnest, unexplained perception of some ecstatic influence or presence, generally accompanied by the burning desire to impart to others the knowledge thence revealed

events.name: Join Organization
events.description: acquire membership to an organization
events.wd_description: mechanism through which new employees acquire the knowledge, skills, and behaviors necessary to become effective organizational members

events.name: Indoctrination
events.description: religious or political indoctrination
events.wd_description: process of forcibly inculcating ideas, attitudes, cognitive strategies or a professional methodology by coercion

events.name: Travel
events.description: increased travel, especially to areas known for terrorist training
events.wd_description: movement of people between geographical locations

events.name: Express Sentiment
events.description: new sentiment is expressed on social media or a public space
events.wd_description: political process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions

events.name: Target Selection
events.description: target is selected, researched, and surveyed
events.wd_description: process of selecting objects or installations to be attacked, taken, or destroyed in warfare

events.name: Training
events.description: weapons and combat training leading up to the attack
events.wd_description: acquisition of knowledge, skills, and competencies as a result of teaching

events.name: Acquisition
events.description: supplies and weapons are acuired
events.wd_description: gaining posession of something, for example the acquisition of a company

events.name: Communication
events.description: organization of a group is orchestrated
events.wd_description: act of conveying intended meanings from one entity or group to another through the use of mutually understood signs and rules

events.name: Assembly
events.description: components of the explosives are assembled
events.wd_description: the act of combining components in manufacturing

events.name: Target Research
events.description: information is gathered
events.wd_description: systematic study undertaken to increase knowledge

events.name: Surveillance
events.description: potential target location is scouted in planning efforts
events.wd_description: systematic recording, measurement, observation or surveillance of a process using technical tools or other observation systems

events.name: Plan Transportation
events.description: logistics of transportation are determined depending on environment
events.wd_description: process of determining the activities required to achieve a desired goal

events.name: Transportation
events.description: Persons and weapons are transported to site of attack
events.wd_description: None

events.name: Issue Threat
events.description: threats are broadcasted from the terrorist(s)
events.wd_description: condition that is appraised as a danger to one's self or well-being or to a group

events.name: Emplacement
events.description: explosives are strategically placed at the site of attack
events.wd_description: process of installing materials or components into a system, such as a building

events.name: Shooting
events.description: a shooting terrorist attack on a targeted group
events.wd_description: incident involving multiple victims of gun violence and typically where some victims are killed

events.name: Detonation
events.description: explosive materials undergo combustion
events.wd_description: supersonic combustion of an explosive material

events.name: Broadcast of Actions
events.description: responsibility is claimed by the terrorist(s)
events.wd_description: none

events.name: Injury
events.description: victims of the attack are wounded
events.wd_description: physiological wound caused by an external source

events.name: Death
events.description: victims of the attack are killed violently
events.wd_description: death caused by violence

events.name: Emergency Declared
events.description: A state of emergency effects the immediate area of attack
events.wd_description: situation such as a natural or man-made disaster requiring urgent assistance

events.name: Crowd Control
events.description: general public is moved away from the attack site
events.wd_description: urgent movement of people away from the threat or actual occurrence of a hazard

events.name: Manhunt
events.description: terrorist(s) are searched for
events.wd_description: extensive and thorough search for a wanted fugitive

events.name: Social Media Response
events.description: social media spreads information rapidly
events.wd_description: mass media information exchange

events.name: Journalism
events.description: media outlets cover news of the terrorist attack
events.wd_description: news published over radio or television

events.name: Protest
events.description: the general public is in a state of civil disorder
events.wd_description: forms of unrest arising from a mass act of civil disobedience in which the participants become hostile toward authority, and authorities incur difficulties in maintaining public safety and order, over the disorderly crowd

events.name: Combat Training
events.description: increase in physical strength leading up to attack
events.wd_description: none

events.name: Dry Run Attack
events.description: attack is rehearsed to identify weaknesses
events.wd_description: manifesting theory into physical action

events.name: Visit Shooting Range
events.description: precision is practiced at a shooting range
events.wd_description: sports involving firearms used to hit targets

events.name: Weapons Training
events.description: knowledge and experience of handling weapons is increased
events.wd_description: acquisition of knowledge, skills, and competencies as a result of teaching

events.name: Theft
events.description: supplies or weapons are stolen
events.wd_description: act of taking another's property without permission or consent

events.name: Wire Transfer
events.description: funds are transferred for the attack
events.wd_description: the moving of wealth from one place or owner to another

events.name: Purchase Supplies
events.description: supplies and weapons are purchased legally or illegally
events.wd_description: acquisition of goods or services by fiduciary exchange

events.name: Assemble Explosive
events.description: Explosive(s) are assembled
events.wd_description: the act of combining components in manufacturing

events.name: Assemble Detonator
events.description: Detonator(s) are assembled
events.wd_description: the act of combining components in manufacturing

events.name: Concealment
events.description: explosives are concealed
events.wd_description: process of preventing observation of something

events.name: Group Forms
events.description: co-conspirers form a group
events.wd_description: in parliamentary procedure, gathering of a group of people to make decisions

events.name: Phone Communication
events.description: telecommunication between group members
events.wd_description: conversation through telephone call

events.name: Electronic Communication
events.description: communication is done through the internet or a similar electronic network
events.wd_description: communication between two parties in remote locations, either concurrent or non-concurrent; correspondence and telecommunication

events.name: In-person Communication
events.description: communication is done in person
events.wd_description: communication by words

events.name: Medical Evacuation
events.description: first responders and paramedics evacuate injured victims
events.wd_description: emergency evacuation for medical reasons
